t: Sing to the Lord a New Song
Praise*pn the Lord!*s Sing*ln to the Lord*s a new song, his*ld praise in the assembly of the godly!
Let*ln Israel be glad in his Maker; let*ld the children of Zion rejoice in their King!
Let*ln them praise his name with dancing, making*ld melody to him with tambourine and lyre!
For*ln the Lord*s takes pleasure in his people; he*ld adorns the humble with salvation.
Let*ln the godly exult in glory; let*ld them sing for joy on their beds.
Let*ln the high praises of God be in their throats and*ld two-edged swords in their hands,
to*ln execute vengeance on the nations and*ld punishments on the peoples,
to*ln bind their kings with chains and*ld their nobles with fetters of iron,
to*ln execute on them the judgment written! This*ld is honor for all his godly ones. Praise*ln the Lord!*s
